languages.text: "Забрать ее... с собой? Не думаю, что смогу находиться слишком близко. Душа провидицы требует возмездия, и она желает заполучить его в виде моих страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Забрать ее... с собой? Не думаю, что смогу находиться слишком близко. Душа провидицы требует возмездия, и она желает заполучить его в виде моих страданий".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
languages.original_text: "Забрать ее... с собой? Не думаю, что смогу находиться слишком близко. Душа провидицы требует возмездия, и она желает заполучить его в виде моих страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Take her... with us? I don't think I will be able to stay too close to it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Take her... with us? I don't think I will be able to stay too close to it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Llevarla... con nosotros? No creo que sea capaz de soportar estar cerca de ella. El alma de la vidente clama venganza, y mi sufrimiento es el precio que exige cobrar».
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: «¿Llevarla... con nosotros? No creo que sea capaz de soportar estar cerca de ella. El alma de la vidente clama venganza, y mi sufrimiento es el precio que exige cobrar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女を…連れて行くのか？だが我は自分が随行できるとは思えない。先見司の魂はヴェンジェンスを求めているし、この苦しみを代価として受け取りたがっている」
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女を…連れて行くのか？だが我は自分が随行できるとは思えない。先見司の魂はヴェンジェンスを求めているし、この苦しみを代価として受け取りたがっている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你要带着她……和我们一起吗？我想我恐怕无法靠近它。这个先知的灵魂渴望复仇，而我的痛苦正是她索求的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: “你要带着她……和我们一起吗？我想我恐怕无法靠近它。这个先知的灵魂渴望复仇，而我的痛苦正是她索求的东西。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « L'emporter... avec nous ? Je ne pense pas pouvoir rester près du plateau. L'âme du Grand Prophète réclame vengeance et ma souffrance est le prix qu'elle demande. »
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: « L'emporter... avec nous ? Je ne pense pas pouvoir rester près du plateau. L'âme du Grand Prophète réclame vengeance et ma souffrance est le prix qu'elle demande. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Zum ... Schiff schaffen? Ich glaube nicht, dass ich in seiner Nähe bleiben kann. Die Seele der Runenprophetin dürstet nach Rache und mein Leiden ist die Schuld, die sie sich einfordert."
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: "Zum ... Schiff schaffen? Ich glaube nicht, dass ich in seiner Nähe bleiben kann. Die Seele der Runenprophetin dürstet nach Rache und mein Leiden ist die Schuld, die sie sich einfordert."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Onu... Yanımıza mı alacağız? Yakınına yaklaşabileceğimi sanmıyorum. Ötesezen'in ruhu, intikam buyuruyor. Bunu da bana eziyet çektirerek yapıyor ya."
languages.original_text: "Take her... with us? I do not think I will be able to remain near it. The Farseer's soul demands vengeance, and my suffering is the due she wants to collect."

traits.locale_text: "Onu... Yanımıza almak mı? Onun yakınında bile durabileceğimi sanmıyorum. Ötesezen'in ruhu, intikam buyuruyor. Benim çektiğim eziyetse almayı buyurduğu intikamın bedeli."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
